newsitem.title: JAPAN: NCB says issued Y70 bln of 5-yr debentures in Q1.
newsitem.headline: NCB says issued Y70 bln of 5-yr debentures in Q1.

text.p: Nippon Credit Bank Ltd (NCB) said on Thursday that it issued some 70 billion yen worth of five-year debentures for sale to institutional investors in the January-March quarter.

The five-year debentures, issued monthly, are the bank's key fund-raising tool. NCB started selling new 2.35 percent five-year debentures on Thursday. The April debentures' subscription period ends on April 25.
The bank issued some 439 billion yen of five-year debentures from April through September last year before fears over the bank's financial health intensified.
